code_info: 12/2# SX, 214, 1197375, 127538  12/2# SX, 214, 1197447, 127538  12/2# SX, 217, 1197987, 127984  12/2# SX, 217, 1199542, 127984  12/3# SX, 210, 1195242, 517701  12/3# SX, 210, 1195243, 517701  12/3# SX, 210, 1195244, 517701  12/3# SX, 210, 1195249, 517701    12/2# SX, Julian pack date, lot codes customer PO#  12/3# SX, Julian pack date, lot codes customer PO#  Note: SX = Sacks  Each customer order is associated with a unique file number assigned to that order. The customer PO# is captured within the order number. As product is packaged and palletized, a pallet is tag produced providing an identifier lot number, pack date, package information, pallet piece quantity, weight, pack date and grade. Each pallet is given a specific tag number utilizing the previous information for trace back to the previous source. Individual cartons have a printed PTI on each carton. The individual wineglass labels are coded with the Julian date for the 2# and 3# individual packages. All information is captured in Famous, the software used for produce tracking.
